snippet: General Motors announced that it planned to halt production of the Volt for five weeks, another troubling sign for a hybrid whose sales fell short of targets last year.
abstract: General Motors will again halt production of the Chevrolet Volt, citing a surplus of the model at dealerships; suspension will result in temporary layoff of 1,300 workers.
lead_paragraph: General Motors announced that it planned to halt production of the Volt for five weeks, another troubling sign for a hybrid whose sales fell short of targets last year.
